name: European Council of the Paint, Printing Ink and Artists' Colours Industry
goal: CEPE is a non-profit-making organisation.  Its objective is to study scientific and technical data concerning the European paint, printing inks and artistsâ€™ colours industries and to circulate information and surveys of a scientific and technical nature in order to promote the image of the industry, to keep the members up-to-date and to protect their common interests.
interests: Education and training, Environment, Food Safety
euInitiatives:
Environmental policies, chemical policies, labelling and classification, biocidal products, Nano materials, sustainability.
Packaging regulations, food contact regulations.
